segments.text: Hi , Bill . Are you going to the commencement ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes . Do you want to go with me ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: OK . ( Several minutes later . ) Let's go into the school auditorium .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Now that take this seat . Do you see those piles of red diplomas on the desks on the stage ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes . I find my heart is now rising and falling like waves , all sorts of feelings welling up in my heart .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That's true . Four years ' trails and hardships , joys and sorrows of life are gushing out to my mind all together . I can hardly tell whether I am joyful or gloomy at the moment when I am about to leave the campus and to start a new stage of my life .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: How time flies . Look , the president of the college has come onto the stage .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: He's going to make the opening speech .
segments.speaker: S2
